comment: What happened with your FG? how long did you ferment and at what temp? how did this come out?

I am not sure what happened with the fg.  I was surprised it didn't attenuate more.  Don't know what my exact temps were but i brewed this in November 2012.  My ambient temp in my basement this time of year is about 67 and had it in a swamp cooler with a fan blowing on it so it was probably about 64.  I recall it being OK., not my best but certainly not my worst.
Maybe some old yeast? well good to here it was at least ok and thanks for response.
Next time try ramping up the temp after about day 5. bring it up to 68 F for a few a week or more.
